parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> HashMap

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Retrieves a value out of a [[HashMap]] after looking it up by its key. When the HashMap doesn't contain the key, the default value is returned

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> hashMap [[getOrDefault]] [key, defaultValue]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> hashMap : [[HashMap]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> key: [[HashMapKey]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> defaultValue: [[Anything]] - (Optional, default [[nil]])

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _myValue = _myHashMap [[getOrDefault]] ["a", "Not Found!"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[HashMap]] [[get]]
</value></part></template></root>
